attributes.action: Recognize Ukrainian diplomas for full employment of Ukrainians in the UK
attributes.additional_details: because the professional skills of Ukrainians are no different from European standards
attributes.background: To decide on the recognition of Ukrainian diplomas of higher educational institutions in order to fully employ Ukrainians in the acquired specialties

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about what qualifications to require of potential employees are a matter for individual employers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
